title: SOLD Walter Johnson T206 portrait SGC
author: square5000

posts.post_title: SOLD Walter Johnson T206 portrait SGC
posts.post_content:
SOLD.

Hello,
I have a T206 portrait of Walter Johnson for sale. The front of the card is exceptional, with bright colors and perfect centering. The back would be perfect if not for a smidge of paper loss over the 'E' in Sweet. There is absolutely no creasing, and the edges look great. SGC deemed the card a SGC40 Very Good. 

Selling for $1,050. I accept check, money order or Paypal. Insurance and priorirty mail shipping are included in price. Open to offers or payment plans.

[url=https://flic.kr/p/o2WPzy][img]https://farm3.staticflickr.com/2907/14461861494_d085b38095_c.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/o2WPzy][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3910/14276531267_4ed39c526c_c.jpg[/img][/url]


Please contact me by email or PM.

Thank you,
Peter Baldes
[url]pbaldes@gmail.com[/url]

Peter, that's a beautiful Johnson portrait! If I hadn't just bought mine a little over a month ago, I'd buy yours. I actually think yours has slightly better eye appeal than mine.

Good luck. Somebody is going to get a great card!!

I sold this one for $640.  I wish I still had it....:confused:

[IMG]http://6748b49c21d72e4aa23d-0f18a15c4888d140abf3c9ede40861f2.r90.cf1.rackcdn.com/8769173.JPG[/IMG]

Thanks for the kind words Bill!

Wow Bobby, that is a nice card!

Peter
Mark, you got an excellent card. I would have jumped on it, but you beat me to it.  :(

[quote name="square5000" post=1290198]Thanks for the kind words Bill!

Wow Bobby, that is a nice card!

Peter[/QUOTE]

Thanks Peter.  Sometimes I get cards that I wish I never sold.  That is one of them.  The Big Train.......ahhhhhh.....oh well.......it's just cardboard, right?
